> [hggggfff](#comment_10_1GUhkGiS4PmRreV33ddFfEMqfdgjJGpn9Y): Everything that needs a central authority to confirm something can't be decentralized.i.e. a onlineshop where you get a status of your order and maybe delivery status

Why not?  Because it is a single source of info or because it is private?  If the latter, Order status could be distributed, but only you can decrypt the status of your order.  A current example is ZeroMail.
